pr_title: Update the Fabric8 Kubernetes client to 4.13

timeline.message:
Update the Fabric8 Kubernetes client to 4.13

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

Update the Fabric8 Kubernetes client to 4.13

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

timeline.bodyText: from where this seccompProfile comes? what is that?
timeline.author: ppatierno
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1589,6 +1596,13 @@ spec:
                                     type: string
                                   user:
                                     type: string
+                              seccompProfile:

replies.bodyText: New versions of Fabric8 often adopt newer Kubernetes schemas which have new fields. And that can change the CRDs in places where we use the Kubernetes APIs directly - here in this case the security context.
replies.author: scholzj
